name: Sujeto 124: El hombre de traje
description:
Daniel Arias heads towards a mysterious house that his company bought, but upon arrival he will discover a terrible truth.
He investigates the abandoned house, solving puzzles, finding objects and combining them to get crucial clues that will help you discover what happened in this old place.


Explore an abandoned house, in a first-person gameplay, where you will have to find clues that help you understand more why you are there, you will find objects that you can inspect and keep in your inventory, and even combine them to obtain essential aids for your progress, while you enter a dark and scary environment.


Daniel receives a call from his secretary, along with the news that his company bought a house in a small town, so Daniel goes to the house, but when he arrives, he finds himself in a very unusual situation. the usual ..
